= Midrealms Campaign =
This campaign takes place in the southwestern area of the [[Midrealms>>Midrealms]], known locally as [[Farlond>>Farlond]].
== Episodes ==

== Dragon Mountain ==
=== The Altar of Kargarax ===
The orc shaman Druugstak will direct the party to the altar, where he demands that they pay their respects to the dragon god, Kargarax.
